events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving a collision with another vehicle on the highway.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after confirmation of vehicle involvement in a collision.
An insurance claim agent was assigned to manage the auto accident claim and communicate with the claimant.
The insured received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the company.
The agent requested photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for further investigation.
The claimant submitted all required documents including photos and the official police report within the requested deadline.
Investigation into the auto accident claim commenced to determine fault and verify the extent of damage to the vehicle.
The investigation concluded, confirming the insured was not at fault and damage estimates were verified by the adjuster.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the full repair costs of the insured vehicle as per the damage assessment.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the clarity and responsiveness of the claim handling process.
The claim was approved officially by the insurer, confirming settlement terms were accepted by all parties.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and transferred to the insuredâ€™s account without delay.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful payment issuance and claimant satisfaction.
